LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.label: Miho Plasma Nodachi
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.description: An improved, huge single-edged sword that emits plasma. The blade's cutting power is comparable to that of the jetstream warriors of Ancient Earth.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredMarine.label: Miho Storm Exoskeleton
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredMarine.descri: Miho Orbital Storm exoskeleton used by the Marines. It is specialized in close combat and can jump over short distances by burning Mechanite.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Marine.label: Miho Storm Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Marine.description: Miho Orbital Storm helmet used by the Marines. It promotes the user's close combat instincts and provides excellent protection.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Sailor.label: Miho Space Sailor Outfit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Sailor.description: This is the sailor suit worn by space Mihos. It also serves as a hostile environmental protection gear.
